hero.title: Turbo Charge your Zero Trust Initiative
hero.subtitle: Procella is your trusted partner to provide experience and expertise in Zero Trust/SASE
hero._comment_for_logos: clientlogos is an array of objects with logo and url.  logo is an SVG in static/images/logos/clients/

tiles.title: Readiness Assessments
tiles.text: Fine-grained assessments of strategic/operational readiness for Zero Trust/SASE

tiles.title: Strategic Planning
tiles.text: Experienced vision and guidance for all facets of Zero Trust/SASE rollouts

tiles.title: Demystifying Zero Trust
tiles.text: Pre- and post-sales support/partnership for a wide range of vendors

features.title: Practical Experience
features.text:
- 50+ years combined IT/Security experience
- 37+ years combined Akamai tenure in a variety of IT, product, and customer-facing roles
- Successfully led all major infrastructure and security rollouts and integrations
- Identification of/due diligence for M&A targets

features.title: Subject Matter Expertise
features.text:
- Security Architecture, Engineering and Operations
- Network and Systems Infrastructure
- Identity and Access Management
- Scripting and orchestration
- Technology integrations

features.title: Thought Leadership
features.text:
- SASE and Zero Trust evangelists/speakers
- Strategic vision with a contemporary touch
- Comfortable speaking with board members, CXOs and all levels of technologists and business leaders
- Focused on solutions, not vendors
